snippet.title: Just Hoops - Official Meta Quest Launch Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
snippet.description: Just Hoops is available now on Meta Quest. Check out the latest trailer for another look at this arcade basketball gaming VR experience, including playing ball just about anywhere, playing with friends, and more. Additionally, the trailer reveals permanent hoops for custom arenas in your home that will be coming in 2024.
